entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
